segments.text: I notice the woman standing there, totally unaware of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink faucet is running full blast, filling everything up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the boy's stool is about to give way!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, but that tilt is shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up expectantly, not seeing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out in a steady stream over the sink edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle catches me off guard; how hasn't she slipped?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar brims with treats, drawing them in unexpectedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a serene garden, which surprises me amid the frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet doors swing wide, framing their sneaky mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing no one's noticed the growing flood yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman adds a normal touch to this wild setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole composition is surprisingly detailed for a simple drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrasts between calm outside and havoc inside hit me suddenly.
segments.speaker: PAR
